title: Georgia: Immigrants Found in Truck
body:
Six illegal immigrants were discovered in a truck headed for a cargo facility near the Atlanta airport Tuesday night, 
but they are not suspected of plotting to do any harm, federal authorities said. The men, who were hired to lay 
carpet at the facility, could not provide proof of legal residency during a routine inspection. They may face 
deportation, according to the Immigration and Customs Enforcement department. They did not have access to 
secure areas of the airport, authorities said.

http://www.nytimes.com
